title: Ever since the recent update, Firefox automatically opens my previous session on start-up
content:
The box in Settings > General > Startup > Open previous windows and tabs is still unticked.

Does anyone know what could be causing it and how to fix it?

Thanks :)
creator: Redstar2613

title: slow download on ebay
content: For the last few days the ebay website is very slow when I open it. If I switch to Chrome, ebay's website loads okay. All other websites seem to load through Firefox with no problem. Any ideas???

title: all the old threads open up in a response back
content: Suddenly I am getting email messages that are underlined. I noticed that that means It is a response to one of my emails. When I open the message all past all messages in the thread open too. It's very annoying to have to close all of them. how do I fix?

title: Sending Tab from Android Mobile to PC Not Functioning
content: I am having trouble sending tabs from my phone to my PC. My device is connected to my computer, and I can send tabs from my PC to my phone successfully, but not the other way around. I have no idea what could even be the issue, and I have only seen people asking about sending tabs from PC to Mobile, not the other way around. Is there something I am missing? None of the Firefox troubleshoot pages have helped.
creator: maddiewall500
